text: 21.18 Jon 13.36, Apo 12.3-4 Nep nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin, nad bɨlel bɨ pɨlaj mɨdɨl, sɨbnag nad ak pog lɨl, gos nad ke nepan tek ajelɨgɨpan agak. Pen kɨdek bɨ mɨlep yenɨgaban ñɨn ak, chech nak ma lep tek, ñɨn nak dad aplanɨgaban, bɨ olap ne chech nep lɨ ñɨl, sɨbnag nep ak pog lɨl ñɨl, ma amnɨg gɨnɨgaban okok dad amnɨgab agak.
